				<div class="et_pb_promo_description"><h2 class="et_pb_module_header">Welcome to Mac Gamer HQ!</h2><div><p>We’ll show you everything Mac gaming has to offer and help you make the most of your macOS gaming experience.</p>
<p>Are you a <strong>die-hard Mac user that also happens to enjoy video games</strong>? You’re in the right place.</p>
<p>It’s time we kill the myth that having a Mac means giving up on video games.</p></div></div>
